Package com.ibm.streamsx.dps

This package contains functions for creating and managing Stores.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Store
    Represents a user created distributed store.
    StoreFactory
    This is an interface for the store factory with the available methods declared here.
    StoreIterator
    This class represents an iterator over the contents of a Store.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistributedStores
    This is the main entry point for using the Distributed Store API - this class is used to get a StoreFactory, which in turn, is used to create Stores.
    KeyValuePair  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StoreException  
    StoreFactoryException  

Package com.ibm.streamsx.dps Description

This package contains functions for creating and managing Stores. A DPS store is a container in which K/V pairs can be created, retrieved from, updated and deleted. The keys and values must be a SPL primitive type, such as `rstring` or `int32`, or a composite type such as a `map`. The StoreFactory class is used to create and remove Stores.
